thread.section_title: Police Respond To Call Of Woman With Gun At Pasadena City Hall – CBS Los Angeles
thread.title: Police Respond To Call Of Woman With Gun At Pasadena City Hall
thread.title_full: Police Respond To Call Of Woman With Gun At Pasadena City Hall

author: Jonathan Polakoff
title: Police Respond To Call Of Woman With Gun At Pasadena City Hall
text:
PASADENA (CBSLA.com) — Police Thursday evening were responding to a report of a woman with a gun at Pasadena City Hall.
A SWAT team had responded to the area at around 5:45 p.m. and bystanders reported a heavy police presence.
A nearby library was placed on lockdown.
No other information was immediately available.
This is a developing story. Refresh for updates.
